title: Welcome
welcome: Hello! You may choose any section to get help or know your mental health status.
welcome_chat: Hello! My name is Akili from PAWHA, I'm here to help you. Please, if you have any psychological challenges, feel free to tell me, and I will assist you as much as I can.
PHQ9_description: Would you like to assess yourself? Open this section!
GAD7_description: Would you like to understand your condition related to anxiety? Open this section!
nlp_description: Talk to an Assistant on your situation for instant help and advice.
rule_description: Here you will be educated about common psychological problems like anxiety and depression.
experts_description: Find psychological experts available in your region and district
assessment_guide: Over the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by any of the following problems?
PHQ9_1: 1. Little interest or pleasure in doing things
PHQ9_3: 3. Trouble falling or staying asleep, or sleeping too much
PHQ9_4: 4. Feeling tired or having little energy
PHQ9_6: 6. Feeling bad about yourself — or that you are a failure or have let yourself or your family down
PHQ9_7: 7. Trouble concentrating on things, such as reading the newspaper or watching television
PHQ9_8: 8. Moving or speaking so slowly that other people could have noticed?  Or the opposite — being so fidgety or restless that you have been moving around a lot more than usual
PHQ9_9: 9. Thoughts that you would be better off dead or of hurting yourself in some way
GAD7_1: 1. Feeling nervous, anxious, or on edge
GAD7_2: 2. Not being able to stop or control worrying
GAD7_3: 3. Worrying too much about different things
GAD7_5: 5. Being so restless that it is hard to sit still
GAD7_7: 7. Feeling afraid, as if something awful might happen
use_akili: You can use Akili, our AI assistant, on the home page for more help.
followup_instruction: Please provide your contact details so we can follow up and assist you better.
enter_contact: Enter your phone, email or both
enter_description: Write a short description of what you're going through...
followup_success_message: Thank you! Your information has been received. We will process your case and get in touch soon.
assess_child: Assess as a Teacher or Parent
